effect_summary: +1 Joker slot
notes: The Antimatter Voucher is always displayed in game as if it was a negative edition and applies the same effect as negative Jokers. If all vouchers have been purchased in a run, blank will appear in the shop.

effect_summary: Does nothing?
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Redeem Blank 10 total times; The Antimatter Voucher is always displayed in game as if it was a negative edition and applies the same effect as negative Jokers. If all vouchers have been purchased in a run, blank will appear in the shop.

effect_summary: All cards and packs in shop are 25% off
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Redeem at least 10 Voucher cards in one run; Also reduces the sell value of your present jokers Prices are rounded half down

effect_summary: +1 consumable slot
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Use a total of 25 Tarot cards from booster packs; Omen Globe has a 20% individual chance to replace the Tarot card with a Spectral card for every card in the Arcana Pack

effect_summary: Reroll Boss Blind 1 time per Ante, $10 per roll
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Discover 25 Blinds

effect_summary: Foil , Holographic , and Polychrome cards appear 4X more often
constraints: Have at least 5 Joker cards with Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome (or Negative) effect
notes: Polychrome on Jokers actually appears 3x more often for Hone and 7x more often for Glow Up

effect_summary: Permanently gain +1 hand per round
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Play a total of 2500 cards

effect_summary: -1 Ante, -1 hand each round
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Reach Ante level 12

effect_summary: Foil , Holographic , and Polychrome cards appear 2X more often
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Have at least 5 Joker cards with Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome (or Negative) effect; Polychrome on Jokers actually appears 3x more often for Hone and 7x more often for Glow Up

effect_summary: Playing cards in shop may have an Enhancement , Edition , and/or a Seal
constraints: Buy a total of 20 Playing cards from the shop
notes: Illusion is currently (v1.0.1o-FULL) bugged, and cards in the shop cannot have seals, only enhancements and/or editions, and is unaffected by Hone/Glow Up.

effect_summary: All cards and packs in shop are 50% off
constraints: Redeem at least 10 Voucher cards in one run
notes: Also reduces the sell value of your present jokers Prices are rounded half down

effect_summary: Playing cards can be purchased from the shop
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Buy a total of 20 Playing cards from the shop; Illusion is currently (v1.0.1o-FULL) bugged, and cards in the shop cannot have seals, only enhancements and/or editions, and is unaffected by Hone/Glow Up.

effect_summary: Raise the cap on interest earned in each round to $20
constraints: Max out the interest per round earnings for ten consecutive rounds
notes: Does nothing when playing the Green Deck.

effect_summary: Permanently gain an additional +1 hand per round
Planet cards in your consumable area give X1.5 Mult for their specified poker hand
constraints: Use a total of 25 Planet cards from booster packs
notes: Telescope picks the higher tier hand in case of multiple most played hands

effect_summary: Spectral cards may appear in any of the Arcana Packs
constraints: Use a total of 25 Tarot cards from booster packs
notes: Omen Globe has a 20% individual chance to replace the Tarot card with a Spectral card for every card in the Arcana Pack

effect_summary: +1 card slot available in shop (to 3 slots)
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Spend a total of $2500 at the shop; Also immediately restocks any empty card slots in the Shop when purchased

effect_summary: +1 card slot available in shop (to 4 slots)
constraints: Spend a total of $2500 at the shop
notes: Also immediately restocks any empty card slots in the Shop when purchased

effect_summary: +1 hand size
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Reduce your hand size down to 5 cards

effect_summary: +1 hand size again
constraints: Reduce your hand size down to 5 cards

effect_summary: -1 Ante again, -1 discard each round
Planet cards appear 2X more frequently in the shop
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Buy a total of 50 Planet cards from the shop; For details, see The Shop#Vouchers

effect_summary: Planet cards appear 4X more frequently in the shop
constraints: Buy a total of 50 Planet cards from the shop
notes: For details, see The Shop#Vouchers

effect_summary: Permanently gain an additional +1 discard each round
Rerolls cost an additional $2 less
constraints: Reroll the shop a total of 100 times

effect_summary: Rerolls cost $2 less
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Reroll the shop a total of 100 times

effect_summary: Reroll Boss Blind unlimited times, $10 per roll
Raise the cap on interest earned in each round to $10
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Max out the interest per round earnings for ten consecutive rounds; Does nothing when playing the Green Deck.

effect_summary: Tarot cards appear 2X more frequently in the shop
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Buy a total of 50 Tarot cards from the shop; For details, see The Shop#Vouchers

effect_summary: Tarot cards appear 4X more frequently in the shop
constraints: Buy a total of 50 Tarot cards from the shop
notes: For details, see The Shop#Vouchers

effect_summary: Celestial Packs always contain the Planet card for your most played poker hand
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Use a total of 25 Planet cards from booster packs; Telescope picks the higher tier hand in case of multiple most played hands

effect_summary: Permanently gain +1 discard each round
notes: Upgrade unlock condition: Discard a total of 2500 cards
